name: Beehive Plumbing
address: 350 E 400 S #308, Salt Lake City, UT 84111
description: Beehive Plumbing has been Salt Lake City's trusted plumbing experts for over a decade. Our licensed plumbers provide fast, reliable service with upfront pricing and a 100% satisfaction guarantee.

services.name: Drain Cleaning
services.description: Professional drain cleaning and clog removal using advanced hydro-jetting and camera inspection technology.

services.name: Pipe Repair & Replacement
services.description: Expert pipe repair and trenchless sewer line replacement. We fix leaks fast with minimal disruption.

services.name: Water Heater Services
services.description: Installation, repair, and maintenance of all water heater types including tankless and hybrid models.
